short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redoes a Google search with site:reddit.com appended when pressing shift+R

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension redoes a Google search when pressing "Shift + R" while on a results page, with "site:reddit.com" appended to the search.

This extension stems from the observation of the following pattern:
1. I search for something requiring an opinion, such as "best browser for Windows 2021"
2. I see results that seem like ads or have a low amount of depth
3. I add "site:reddit.com"
4. Search again

This extension aims to save a few keystrokes (17 keystrokes in the above case).

New pattern:

1. Search
2. I see results that seem like ads or have a low amount of depth
3. "Shift + R"
